item.title: Basic Markdown
item.description: Markdown is very easy to learn and write. It is broadly used in websites, notes, documents, etc. In this article, we will go through some basic syntax of markdown to help you get started. I strongly encourage you to take this interactive tutorial from Markdown Tutorial. Styling Text Surround text with one * or _ to make it italic two * or _ to make it bold three * or _ to make it italic and bold, or you can mix and match it
